title: MEET OUR TEAM
author: Sushma Shah; Naturopathic Doctor
description: Toronto Naturopath Sushma Shah specializes in Women's health issues and digestive issues. Toronto naturopathic clinic has special programs for smoking cessation, weight management, allergies, stress management, candida, hair loss, menopause. We use the following naturopathic modalities: accupunture, Reiki, hypnosis, botanical medicine, homeopathy, diet and lifestyle counselling, traditional Chinese medicine - tongue and pulse diagnosis.
cleaned_text: Dr. SUSHMA SHAH, N.D. is the founder and owner of the Nature's Intentions Naturopathic Clinic since 2004. She is an experienced, licensed and registered Doctor of Naturopathy in Toronto who is dedicated to helping you achieve your wellness objectives by combining skill and expertise that spans the entire wellness spectrum of well being using the core principles of naturopathy. She graduated from the [Canadian College of Naturopathic Medicine](https://www.ccnm.edu), in 2004, after finishing her Honors Bachelor of Science at the University of Toronto. She is dedicated to helping people be it at a seminar, or a lecture, at a health exhibition or in her private practice at the Davisville Medical Center in Toronto. She is always willing to go the extra mile to help her clients to restore their health and vitality by addressing the root cause of any health issue and then treating it naturally. She is known for her patience, compassion, knowledge and her willingness to help people. She uses various natural therapies such as [acupuncture](https://www.naturesintentionsnaturopathy.com/acupuncture/toronto-acupuncture-centre.html) (Traditional and [Cosmetic Acupuncture](https://www.naturesintentionsnaturopathy.com/cosmetic-acupuncture/toronto-cosmetic-acupuncture-centre.html)), Traditional Chinese medicine, [herbal medicines](https://www.naturesintentionsnaturopathy.com/botanical-medicine/botanical-medicine-overview.htm) (Chinese and Western herbs), [homeopathy](https://www.naturesintentionsnaturopathy.com/homeopathy/what-is-homeopathy.html), [hypnotherapy](https://www.naturesintentionsnaturopathy.com/hypnosis/hypnosis-overview.html), diet and lifestyle counselling and nutrition therapy to heal the clients holistically - body, mind and spirit. Over the past 17 years, her caring, in-depth, thorough and no - nonsense approach towards each client has helped thousands of people achieve their health and wellness goals as well, regain their optimal health and well-being. She offers natural treatments for all age groups. Sushma Shah N.D. treats various women's, men's and children's health issues. She offers [Naturopathic Health Programs](https://www.naturesintentionsnaturopathy.com/naturopathic-medicine/naturopathic-health-programs.html) for: Here is the [complete list of the Naturopathic Health Programs](https://www.naturesintentionsnaturopathy.com/naturopathic-medicine/naturopathic-health-programs.html) offered at our Naturopathic Clinic. Please [call our Toronto Naturopathic Clinic](https://www.naturesintentionsnaturopathy.com/contact.html) to find out more about her services and programs. She also offers [workshops and seminars](https://www.naturesintentionsnaturopathy.com/corporate-wellness/toronto-corporate-wellness-centre.html), please check the website for a detailed listing of the upcoming seminars and events she is going to be presenting. If you are interested in having her as a speaker at your event, please contact us at [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#d7beb9b1b897b9b6a3a2a5b2a4beb9a3b2b9a3beb8b9a4b9b6a3a2a5b8a7b6a3bfaef9b4b8ba) or call us at 416 913 4325. If you can build one thing [build your health](https://www.naturesintentionsnaturopathy.com/contact.html)! Heal the root cause of your health problems. DAN MIRON is an accomplished Reiki Master and Teacher in Toronto, Ontario. His passion for spiritual and alternative therapies have led him to study Reiki Energy Therapy, Hypnotherapy and Meditation. He is a very kind, compassionate and caring individual, who never stops to go out of his way to help individuals and families, who need healing in a mental, emotional and spiritual way. He is very dedicated in his passion to heal and teach others how to heal using Reiki Therapy. He currently offers Reiki Treatments, and teaches [Reiki Courses](https://www.naturesintentionsnaturopathy.com/reiki/reiki-course-calendar.htm) and Reiki workshops in Toronto. He specializes in teaching various different types of Reiki Courses, and has been offering Reiki treatments since 2004. [Reiki energy therapy](https://www.naturesintentionsnaturopathy.com/reiki/toronto-reiki-centre.htm) is used for relaxation, pain relief, promotes healing, spiritual development and much more. The Reiki Courses and the Reiki treatment sessions are offered every Tuesday, Wednesday and Sunday at our clinic. A wonderful journey awaits for you . Let's walk togeter! Katerina Zelenkin, is a Registered massage therapist. She is in good standing and member of College of Massage Therapists and member of Registered Massage Therapists Association of Ontario. Her interest in massage therapy was sparked after receiving her first massage from a student clinic. From there she wanted to help people using massage therapy. A graduate of the Sutherland Chan School of massage therapy, she believes there is no quick fix for poor habits (for instance: posture). Massage therapy needs to be part of everyday healthy living, to prevent accumulation of stress, poor posture and re-occurrence of pain among the numerous other benefits. Katerina is passionate about her clients achieving optimal health and living it everyday. Katerina has over 10 years of experience and specializes in relaxation, sports, pregnancy, and deep tissue massage, lymphatic massage among other types of treatments. Generally after your massage treatment, Katerina may suggest some self-care in the form of stretches and strengthening exercises, or hydrotherapy / hot / cold applications based on the focus of treatment. She will also educate you on proper posture and work ergonomics if needed. The massage therapy treatments are adjusted to clients long and short-term goals and the progress is monitored. Re-assessment of treatment goals is usually done after about four treatments. At Nature's Intentions Naturopathic Clinic, we provide naturopathic services that are focused on helping our clients optimize their health and well being.
